actions.name: Solenoglyphs
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a [Jaw] attack.
Effect: The triggering attack has a +30% chance to inflict @Affliction[poison] 5. Attacks that did not previously have a chance to inflict @Affliction[poison] 5 have a 30% of causing @Affliction[poison] 5.
